The condition is often precipitated by a bacterial infection, gastrointestinal bleeding, or large-volume paracentesis without albumin replacement. In this patient, spontaneous bacterial peritonitis likely precipitated the HRS. The mainstay of treatment for HRS is liver transplantation.
